metadata.description: Specifies the location for all resources.
Specifies the environment of the deployment.
Specifies the prefix for all resources created in this deployment.
Specifies the tags that you want to apply to all resources.
Specifies the administrator password of the sql servers.
Specifies the resource ID of the default storage account file system for synapse.
Specifies whether an Azure Data Explorer Pool should be deployed inside your Synapse workspace as part of the template. If you selected dataFactory as processingService, leave this value as is.
Specifies the resource ID of the default storage account  file system for stream analytics.
Specifies the resource ID of the central purview instance.
Specifies whether role assignments should be enabled.
Specifies the resource ID of the subnet to which all services will connect.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for KeyVault.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Synapse Dev.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Synapse Sql.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for EventHub Namespaces.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Cosmos Sql.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Sql Server.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for IoT Hub.

resources.scope: [format('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/{0}/blobServices/{1}/containers/{2}', split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[1], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[2])]
resources.name: [guid(uniqueString(resourceId('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers', split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[1], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[2]), extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', variables('synapseSubscriptionId'), variables('synapseResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.Synapse/workspaces', variables('synapseName'))))]

resources.scope: [format('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/{0}/blobServices/{1}/containers/{2}', split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[1], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[2])]
resources.name: [guid(uniqueString(resourceId('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers', split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[1], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[2]), extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', variables('streamanalyticsjobSubscriptionId'), variables('streamanalyticsjobResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.StreamAnalytics/streamingjobs', variables('streamanalyticsjobName'))))]
